messages.messageBody:
> I don't want anyone to think it's because of the Indian in the
> Cupboard discussion, because it's not, and I don't want anyone to
> think I'm mad because I'm not. And hopefully I didn't make too many
> people mad at me. I simply don't have a lot of time or energy right
> now. My husband is still on the road and he got held up in customs
> in Canada for three days which means he won't be home as soon as I
> expected, and the kids are way more needy than usual, and none of us
> has been feeling well. I just need to focus on getting the kids
> through the next week or two without them beating each other up and
> destroying our home, and I don't have as much time to get into
> involved discussions right now. I'll be back.

Looking forward to your return.
{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{{Sorcha}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary
saftety deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
